about_the_game:
Experience Fantasy Trader, a passion project crafted over three years by a dedicated indie developer. The game is still in production, so the final product may feature a different UI layout, graphics, and game elements than those currently shown in screenshots.

Guide your trading post to riches and fame in a dynamic fantasy world. Build relationships with visiting heroes and address their unique needs and challenges. Defend what’s yours from monsters, thieves, and tax collectors.

As the owner of a trading post, you can pursue many paths toward wealth, fame, bankruptcy, or even death:

  • Develop and leverage 17 different skills, including trade connections, negotiation, leadership, architectural vision, and more. Construct and upgrade over 30 distinct structures to expand your post.

  • Forge your own trading style by sourcing over 300 types of goods from local markets and stocking them in your stores. Capitalize on price fluctuations and a dynamic event system that impacts prices through factors like new taxes, guild and royal politics, wars, and monster invasions.

  • Engage in negotiations with visitors and clients. Want to keep a customer’s interest? Offer them a job? Or perhaps you’d rather share a drink, play a game of dice, or simply chat?

  • Are the local markets lacking interesting goods, or are prices just too high? Try crafting your own products from semi-finished goods—or take your chances on the black market.

  • Consider hiring mercenaries: save on wages by making vague promises, or build a loyal, well-paid team of soldiers. You could even consider overthrowing the king—after all, who enjoys paying taxes? But be prepared for the consequences…

Will you be an honest merchant or a profit-at-all-costs dealer? Earn a reputation as a trustworthy trader or become known for shady, underhanded dealings. Build the most beautiful trading post in the kingdom, or a fortified fortress adorned with war trophies to deter intruders.

Immerse yourself in the world of Fantasy Trader and discover your path.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900, 512mb graphics memory required.
  • Storage: 2024 MB available space
